mapper.insert:
select FREEBOARD_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into FREEBOARD(FREEBOARD_NO, MEMBER_ID, FREEBOARD_TITLE, FREEBOARD_CONTENT, FREEBOARD_GROUPNO,FREEBOARD_FILENAME, FREEBOARD_FILESIZE, FREEBOARD_ORIGINALNAME) values(#{freeboardNo},#{memberId},#{freeboardTitle}, #{freeboardContent},#{freeboardNo},#{freeboardFilename}, #{freeboardFilesize},#{freeboardOriginalname})
mapper.select: select * from FREEBOARD order by FREEBOARD_NO desc
mapper.update: update freeboard set freeboard_readcount=freeboard_readcount+1 where freeboard_no = #{freeboardNo}
